scripts.init: export TOKEN="fb4ac199e3a2141713eef03ac736cc2461368c69" && mkdir results && mkdir results/staging && mkdir results/production
scripts.test: artillery run --output results/report.json performance.yml && artillery report --output results/report.html results/report.json
scripts.test-staging: artillery run -e staging --output results/staging/report.json performance.yml && artillery report --output results/staging/report.html results/staging/report.json
scripts.test-production: artillery run -e production --output results/production/report.json performance.yml && artillery report --output results/production/report.html results/production/report.json
